Title: Stay tuned
Text:
This tour led me to a friend. {Male=He;Female=She} understood the true emotions woven into my music, and before I knew it, I was sharing stories of my homeland. I told this stranger everything without restraint, and somehow, I felt lighter. {Male=He;Female=She} listened as though {Male=he;Female=she} truly understood. What experiences allowed {Male=him;Female=her} to understand such despair? I hope to see {Male=him;Female=her} again at the next concert. I want to know more about {Male=his;Female=her} story and what {Male=he;Female=she} meant by "starting over."



Tricktown, {Male=he;Female=she} didn't come.

Peyero, {Male=he;Female=she} didn't come.

Mendon, {Male=he;Female=she} didn't come.

Skob, {Male=he;Female=she} didn't come.

Dolores, {Male=he;Female=she} didn't come.

Kentart, {Male=he;Female=she} didn't come.

Korr, {Male=he;Female=she} didn't come.

â€¦



{Male=He;Female=She} will never come.
